resources.string: Please specify a button to learn"
Please be learned remote control transmitter head close alignment receiver transmitter head, a distance of about 3CM, and long learning keys 1 to 2S

Software installation:"*. Apk" files copied or downloaded to the phone memory card through the "document management" or "File Manager" to find the file, click on the relevant directory follow the prompts to install, the system will generate: "mobile phone remote control icon;\n

Software information:
 Name: all remote 
 Version: V0.0.1Beta
 
 Contact:
 Company: audiomobile

The first use of the code operation: turn on the device, select the device type, brand or region name and then press automatic Jianniu, paired device reaction: such as switch machines, and out of positions, the volume change action, press the stopthen save the check button is normal, not normal, repeat operation can also manually upward, downward search single brand or a single area to search for matching less than All brand or region within the search code.
The devices is out of Max devices capacity
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"Couldn't connect to the server. Please try again."
This device is out of sync. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
"There is something wrong with your internal storage . Please check it and try again (maybe it's full)"
"It seems like the device you are searching is not yet in out database. Please email us the details of your device and we'll usually add it within a week."
"Couldn't read response from server. Please try again."
You can add a remote for your device(s) now. First, select the type of device you want to control.
"We know that the device you want to control is a %s. Now select it's brand."
"Your %s is almost ready. If you know it's model, select it from the list below. If not, simply select OTHER."
"than a classic remote control please choose a function to be tested"

"We now need to make sure that our remote works with your device. To test that, we're going to try a function of your device, usually POWER ON. Make sure you're pointing your phone at the device while we're doing that."
"No code worked for TYPE BRAND . You can cancel this and make sure it didn't work or you can send us an email. Send an email ?"
It appears this model (%s) has no POWER and it has to be selected separately from the list to be tested
In this flow we can only test POWER ON . If you think your device has no power please go back to the models list and test them manually one by one
"We're sorry but you don't have any remotes with this function."

"From the remotes list, you can hide remotes by tapping the green eye, edit items by long tapping any remote, reorder them by dragging the ≡, or set up advanced commands by using the macros.
Macros are very useful if you've got that perfect “Setting” for one of your appliances. For instance, say you've got an air conditioner that starts up on a higher temperature; you can “build” a macro that will turn on your air conditioner, as well as turning the temperature down with ONE PUSH OF A BUTTON.
This means that macros are used to “stack commands”, or you can delay settings and such by using the “delay” function within the Macros feature. If you've got more than one thing that needs to be done at one time, macros allow you to do it with the push of a button! (Yes, just one.)"
The remoted you want to delete is: %s . Proceed?
The learn button you want to delete is: %s . Proceed?
Please enter a new name for this remote
Please enter a new name for this button
Please enter a name for your new Macro
Please enter a name for your new Macro first
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s from %2$s ?
Are you sure you want to delete this macro: %s ?

"Macros are very useful if you've got that perfect “Setting” for one of your appliances. For instance, say you've got an air conditioner that starts up on a higher temperature; you can “build” a macro that will turn on your air conditioner, as well as turning the temperature down with ONE PUSH OF A BUTTON.
This means that macros are used to “stack commands”, or you can delay settings and such by using the “delay” function within the Macros feature. If you've got more than one thing that needs to be done at one time, macros allow you to do it with the push of a button! (Yes, just one.)"
These are the commands that will be sent when this macro is used.
This is the list with all your remotes, smart or stock
Are you sure you want to delete %s ?

"Here you have a list of the functions you have learned or added by yourself. If you want to use a device that we don't support yet, you can simply add it's commands here, and then assign them to a Smart Remote."
Please enter a name for your learned command, and the IR code to control it, in Pronto HEX format.

"1. Enter a name for your command 2. Hold your plastic remote 0-1 inch away from the phone's sensor 3. Hold pressed the button on the original remote you want to record. 4. Unless you know the hex code, don't modify the second input box"
Choose function to be added on the custom remote
In order to add a smart remote you need at least a stock one
Please enter a name for your custom remote
You do not have a remote that has the function you selected .

"To create your own custom remote tap each button to assign a function to it.
You are free to assign any function from any of your other remotes, and you can add as many buttons as you wish to the right side as well."
Are you sure you want to remove BUTTON from the current smart remote?
"Unfortunately for your current selection we don't have devices . Please contact us and we will get back to you soon! Email us?"

"It looks like the device you're looking for isn't here, but it may be in a different category. Keep in mind that: - Cable/Satellite devices are in Set Top Box - Home Theaters are in AV System - Movie streamers are in Media Manager - and other combos can be in different categories
If however you believe your device is missing, please send us an email and we'll try to add it in less than 2 weeks. "

"It looks like the device you're looking for isn't here, but it may be in a different category. Keep in mind that: - Cable/Satellite devices are in Set Top Box - Home Theaters are in AV System - Movie streamers are in Media Manager - and other combos can be in different categories
Also, you can try pressing "YES" even if the command didn't work for your model, as there's a high chance that the other buttons will work and you will find replacements using the "COMPATIBLE SERVER COMMANDS feature in the EDIT MODE.
You should prepare your device for testing
to notice any changes and decide if it worked
"We tested all the codes . Please check if the model you chosen is OK, and if it's still not working, drop us an email."
You have to first TEST your device

"Please enter the details of the missing device, including the full Brand and Model name when sending your report. We will start working on adding it to our database within a week, and usually the device gets added within two weeks. Please note that for some devices it can take longer, although we're doing our best to be as fast as possible. Also please keep in mind that other models of the same brand usually use the same remote, so feel free to try those first"

"Unfortunately we can't offer you support right now because you're not using the latest version of Smart Remote. We are adding new support for new devices on every update, and our services update daily, so we can only offer support to customers using the latest version of our app.
Do you want to update now?"
"It seems the device you tested has not responded to our command . You can cancel and make sure you have tested all models or you can send us an email and we'll get back to you"
"You can change between remotes by tapping on the remote name or the arrows by the name. The settings button on the upper right allows you to customize and add more stuff."

On the Settings screen you can control most of the content in the app. The core-feature though is the Smart Remote, which has assignable buttons on which you can add functions from any remote, as well as macros.
"View your remotes, add macros or learn new functions, edit any remote by long-pressing it's name"
You can also edit a remote by pressing the Settings button at the top

Single-tap any button to select it, tap any empty space to move it there, or the plus at the bottom left to remove it. To remove all buttons, shake your phone, and to add new ones tap the plus at the bottom left. To edit any button, long-press it.

"It looks like you've been enjoying Smart Remote. Would you like to give us a rating on Google Play? Good reviews help us improve this product every day!
Thank you!"
Thank you, we really appreciate it!
Do you want to clear the buttons from the remote, so you can re-add them on any spot you want?
Please enter a custom remote name first
Please enter a button name first
"Check out Smart IR Remote for Samsung/HTC! It's awesome!"
"Check out Smart Remote for HTC One! It's awesome!"
SMART REMOTE CONTROL FOR GALAXY S4
SMART REMOTE CONTROL FOR HTC ONE
Please enter a device model first
Please enter a device brand first
"The selected category already contains this brand. Please try all the available models of this brand, and if none work you'll be prompted to report it again."
Your brand is contained in the following categories, and is probably already be supported. Would you like to check them ?
Please enter a name for your function
Please enter code for your function
"This button doesn't have a function assigned to it. The actions currently supported are to open a specific remote, or to show the Floating Remote. What would you like it do do?"
YOU SHOULD TURN OFF YOUR DEVICE
and Smart Remote Control will turn it on
to make sure everything is working properly
"Ok, we'll try now to turn on your device."
Smart Remote Control sent a command to
your device using the best matching remote code.

"To better and more uniquely identify this remote, we need to know it's type, brand name and model. Don't worry, you have auto-suggestions wherever possible.
As for the layout of the remote, you have two options: 1. TV-style remote: the buttons are arranged similarly to a usual TV remote, with arrows, volume and channel buttons 2. Grid-style remote: the buttons are simply placed in an auto-resizing grid."

"Please note that most Air Conditioning units use infrared commands that are not currently supported by your phone's InfraRed Blaster. These codes are either too long or use unusual frequencies, and that is why you won't find them here."
After testing this remote, do you want to keep it, or test the next model?

"Before saving this device, please enter a name for this remote, and optionally your device's model name. The model name is shared with us and will help other users find this remote easier.
Example: -Remote Name: Bedroom TV -Model Name: STR-D672E4"

"Tap any button to assign a function to it, or the + button to add a new function to this remote. To replace a button, simply keep it press for 2 seconds. Please note that if the remote that you are trying to record uses special commands (often on Air Conditioner remotes) you will not be able to record them as they are incompatible with your phone's IR Blaster."
Would you like to continue recording this remote (to replace/add functions) or show and use this remote?
Adjust the delay time in seconds
"You can now restore your remotes。 Please note that performing a restore will wipe all your local remotes and replace them with initial remotes."
"Couldn't perform backup because of a Google Plus error. Please try again later."
"Tap the + sign on the upper left to add a new button to the floating remote."
Are you sure you want to delete this task: %s ?
Please enter a name for your new Task
Please enter a name for your new Task first

"Congratulations, you've just created a macro! To use it, you will have to assign that to a button. You can either do that in the edit mode of a remote, add it to a smart remote or floating remote (chathead), or assign it to a button in a widget."

"Would you like to automatically upload this remote as you add buttons, so that other people can use it (you don't have to do anything)? As tens of new devices appear every day, we know the Smart Remote database isn't always up to date, and this will help other people to use it to it's full potential! It's also very helpful to record all the buttons on your plastic remote.
Thank you!"

"From the settings menu, you can access your list of remotes, as well as change specific options within the app.
Choose list remotes to see a full list of all device-specific and smart remotes programmed into the app, as well as access macros and learned functions.
Choose add remote to add a new device-specific remote.
Choose add smart remote to create a new custom smart remote.
Select use air gestures to enable channel and volume changing by waving your hand over the phone. Waving left and right will change the channel, while waving up and down will change the volume. Note that this option is only available where the air motion sensors are present.
Choose backup/restore remotes to make backups of current remotes, and recover remotes from previous backups."
"To choose a function you want to assign select a remote containing that command, a macro (you can create a new one while you're there), or a custom command you've added yourself."

"Tasks are automated actions which perform when certain conditions are met. For example, you can create a task to execute a command or a macro of commands when your phone rings.
What really makes these tasks unique is their ability to use system-wide events, like automatically performing tasks defined by you when your phone rings, or at a time chosen by you. Of course, you can also perform commands upon executing air gestures or while you're using the hardware volume buttons within the app."
"You can tap the Settings button in the upper right side of the screen to enter the Edit Mode. Feel free to tap and long-tap buttons to discover it's full functionality!"
Feel free to tap and long-tap buttons to fully edit or move them!
Should this action occur every day at the chosen time, or should it only happen once?
"These are some commands that may match your device's remote. Select the one you want to use, then proceed to testing that command in order to add it."
To record extra buttons you can swipe to reveal the secondary screen on the right side, and tap the + (plus) button to add them.

"It looks like you are using a non-stock ROM, which means that we won't be able to offer support if you are having problems with the IR Blaster.
Also, implementations in most of the custom ROMs IR Blaster drivers and APIs are partially broken, causing commands to be queued incorrectly. Because of this, you won't be able to keep a button pressed to send a command continuously.
We're sorry for this, but know that we are working on a fix right now and we will update the app as soon as we find one."
"Whoops, it looks like a file got corrupted and one of your remotes couldn't be read from storage. Would you like to report the log to help us prevent these errors from happening again? Thank you!"
Do you want to permanently delete this command?

"Welcome to Smart IR Remote!
To begin, select a type of device you want to control, then it's brand and the model closest to your own device. Can't find it in the list? Just tap RECORD REMOTE to start recording your original remote. This way you're guaranteed to have a remote exactly like your original plastic controller.
If you experience any kind of problems and you purchased from Google Play please email us at colortigerapps@gmail.com"

"Welcome to Smart IR Remote! Until you get used to our app we'll bother you from time to time with tips on how to make the best of it. Don't worry though, most of them will only be shown once.
To begin, select a type of device you want to control, then it's brand and the model closest to your own device. If you experience any kind of problems and you purchased from Google Play please email us at colortigerapps@gmail.com"
"I HAVE READ THIS AND I UNDERSTAND"

"If you had any commands set on the left panel which you still want to use, you will have to import each of them individually. Don't worry though, they are not lost, and if you re-enable the left panel it will be just as you left it."
" Missing a button? Try going to the "EDIT Mode and tap any + button to find, test and import some compatible server commands". You might even find some commands you didn't know that exist! "

" - On the left panel tap a button once to re-assign it - On the right panel tap a button once to move it - Long tap a button to edit it - Use \"+\" and "LOCAL COMMANDS" to import a button from your other remotes - Use \"+\" and "COMPATIBLE SERVER COMMANDS" to search for missing buttons or replacements for buttons not working on this remote "
Please assign a function to this button first.
Automatically turn on/off the floating remote
There are no available compatible server commands.

You have just added a \"MOST MODELS\"" remote. This means that you'll get the best coverage of buttons with this remote, but you may have buttons not useful to your device, and you can simply delete these buttons in the "EDIT mode.
If the device change the power supply,\n Will terminal the apk first, \nare you sure?
The remote is not exist, \n this funcation is invalid.
